meanings.definition: A synthetic fiber used in making textiles.
meanings.sent1: The orlon felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent2: She bought a cozy sweater made of orlon fabric.
meanings.sent3: The orlon scarf danced in the wind like a playful ribbon.
meanings.sent4: The orlon threads intertwined like a colorful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant orlon material brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: A garment made from orlon fabric.
meanings.sent1: He wore an orlon jacket to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: The orlon dress shimmered under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The orlon shirt seemed to have a mind of its own, always staying wrinkle-free.
meanings.sent4: Her orlon coat was a shield against the chilly weather.
meanings.sent5: The elegant orlon outfit caught everyone's attention.
